body.name: Blesgam Steamer for Clothes, Foldable Clothing Steamer Iron 1150W Strong Power, Portable Travel Handheld Garment Steamer with Fast Heat-up Fabric Wrinkles Remover for Home,Travel(Only for 120v) Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 53 mins
features: 👗REMOVE WRINKLES QUICKLY: The Blesgam steamer for clothes is equipped with a powerful 1150W motor with a secondary heating panel that simultaneously delivers 25g/min of penetrating pulsed steam, which heats up quickly in 30 seconds and is ready to start ironing, clothes steamer allowing you to effectively remove wrinkles from your clothes in the shortest amount of time! Large capacity 120 water tank for longer working time.
👗2 IN 1 STEAMER: Compact and lightweight, this garment steamer is suitable for both vertical and horizontal steaming, 360° No leaks or spills, can steam from any angle.

👗PORTABLE TRAVEL SIZE: The steamer iron for clothes is designed to be lightweight and collapsible for easy storage and portability, clothes steamer handheld perfect for use at home, in the office or while traveling. Travel essentials.

👗SUITABLE FOR MULTIPLE FABRICS: In addition to restoring a delicate shirt to a flat and smooth finish with a handheld iron, this fabric steamer is safe to use on a wide variety of fabrics, such as wrinkle removing clothes, wrinkle removing curtains, wrinkle removing furniture, deodorizing toys and more.

👗[NOTE] For 120V only, using an adapter or portable converter plugged into a 220V outlet will result in malfunction. To ensure optimum performance, remember to remove the tank and drain any remaining liquid when the product is not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far only used two times but it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seal was impossible to close
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, it did not work for me. No matter how hard I tried to close the seal, it would not shut close. This makes the tank just pop out and not stay on. It makes me question how well it stays on even if the seal closes perfectly. I would just hold the steamer up and the tank would fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wrinkle-free must-have!
reviews.reviewText: I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone who needs a reliable and efficient hanging press. It completely changed the way I handle clothes. This compact device has become an integral part of my daily life, and I couldn't rave more about its quality and performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the investment
reviews.reviewText: This streamer is much more convenient for just getting the wrinkles out of everyday outfits than an iron. It heats up in seconds, is easy to use and store, and is safe for most fabrics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clothing steamer
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had this years ago. Super easy to use. Gets hot quickly. Works very well to get the crease out but not damage the clothing. Water tank is the perfect size for my family. Fold to make it easy to travel with. Does get very hot, so be careful. Great item for anyone who has laundry that creases!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer works so well and I love that it heat up in just 15 seconds. It’s perfect for travel and everyday use at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this steamer, but it surpassed my expectations and I am very glad to have it. It has replaced all of my other steamers. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the investment
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when I lived in a tiny place and did not have room for an ironing board. It works great! Now that I live in a bigger place I still like to use it because it is easy and fast to use!
